directions: Heat olive oil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir onion in the hot oil until softened, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir tomato, peas, tomato sauce, and tuna into onion; continue cooking until warm, 3 to 4 minutes; season with salt and black pepper.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Vania's Green Pea Salad
